Articles.Content:
> 
> Holy crap, I missed the pre-party.
> And I'm gonna miss the post-party- Bad graphics card...
> 
> Ey, does anyone think Squad will actually care about the release reviews, seeing how punches won't be held because of the in-dev tag anymore?

They should actually care about the release reviews (Unlike say, EA....), and theyve shown that they do listen to the community, despite some communication issues with posting news stuff on the forum and whatnot.
Earlier the twitch audience voted on the community countdown and it broke. Currently there is 2k viewers hyped for KSP 1.0 release.
Dang, everyone must have fallen asleep all at once! Oh, well. I guess it's time to pass it off to the other time zones. I wonder if the international rooms have their own HypeTrain?

Saves? Go.

Backups? Go.

Patcher? Go.

Hype? Go.

F5? Go.

Vanilla? Go.

Server migration? Go.

SteamDB? Go.

Forums? Go.

Flight? Go.

We're clear for launch of KSP 1.0!

And lift...
I spotted one on the Portuguese section when I saw a thread title something about KSP data and HYPE.

It's not a lot, but there's still some hype left over. Let's see how much it can do before the day officially ends.

As for today's progress, I'd say it was pretty dang fast. We jumped nearly 80 pages today. Not bad!
Does anyone really go to the international forums except for kicks? We need more hype, it releases in 30 min! For real this time!

The reddit AMA is now 3rd on reddit:

[http://www.reddit.com/](http://www.reddit.com/)

I imagine that Maxmaps and co have fallen asleep by now.

The SteamDB stuff is still there, I think they'd have to wrap that up first.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Does anyone really go to the international forums except for kicks? We need more hype, it releases in 30 min! For real this time!

No, I don't go there to troll. I only visited it because I was curious what that particular thread was.

> 
> Does anyone really go to the international forums except for kicks? We need more hype, it releases in 30 min! For real this time!

Don't get too hyped just yet, we don't know when on Monday it releases.

> 
> No, I don't go there to troll. I only visited it because I was curious what that particular thread was.

I didn't mean troll... I just meant that the international forums get very very few visitors.

> 
> Looks like it's 11:00, mexico time.

My fingers are crossed.
I highly doubt that 1.0 will be releasing at midnight, whether or not it seems fitting. I'm still putting my money on later Monday, *maybe* even late morning.

> 
> I highly doubt that 1.0 will be releasing at midnight, whether or not it seems fitting. I'm still putting my money on later Monday, *maybe* even late morning.

Me too, but still! Nine minutes!

> 
> Me too, but still! Nine minutes!

Yeah, nine minutes. But then I'm *really* off to bed. A whole day of hyping can take a lot out of you.
More like 6 minutes, and yeah, I agree, it seems more likely that they'd release in the morning.
4 minutes.

My Steam installation all cleaned up to a pure untouched vanilla 0.90 install in preparation for update (since the Store's backing, multiplay.co.uk, uses a dual bonded E1 line or something and won't be ready for at least a day or two)~ Go go Gadget 1.0 hype!~
You never know though, which is why we are all still here. Ill be up a tree all day tomorrow, so I hope either right now, or later tomorrow.

Considering every time I go up to [www.kerbalspaceprogram.com](http://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com) I keep getting a Server is in migration page, I'm going to assume this isn't releasing until morning... or mid-afternoon... possibly 11:59 PM tomorrow.

> 
> You never know though, which is why we are all still here. Ill be up a tree all day tomorrow, so I hope either right now, or later tomorrow.

Lolwut, are you literally going to be up a tree all day tomorrow?
I think I have been riding this hype train for way too long. Because just now I saw a massive hype train passing us which had KSP multiplayer banners on the windows.
Not happening. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> Lolwut, are you literally going to be up a tree all day tomorrow?

Squirrel Psychiatrist with a day job?

\*restarts steam to be sure\*

Nope.

See you guys in the morning.
